alert.note: Alert for Knox; Sullivan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:52AM EDT until April 09 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...Illinois... Wabash River at Mount Carmel, Riverton, and Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. .Lowland, minor flooding continues along lower portions of the Wabash and White Rivers. With dry weather expected for at least several days, the existing flooding is expected to end over the weekend for most locations, but continue until Tuesday next week at Mount Carmel, and near the end of next week at Hazleton. Minor flooding primarily impacts local river roads, parks, and agricultural land. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Old Darwin Road and a few low rural roads between York and Hutsonville, Illinois begin to flood. Agricultural flooding begins along portions of the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 8.2 feet Tuesday, April 18. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by 11pm Saturday night.
